item.title: Startup Tools: 300+ Most Useful Apps, Software, and Other Resources
item.description:
Startup Tools: 300+ Most Useful Apps, Software, and Other Resources

Startup Tools: 300+ Most Useful Apps, Software, and Other Resources This has become a sort of living document. As we come across more and more resources, we will add them note the date they were added. So you've got an awesome idea for a product/app/service/software/website, but what now?

item.title: PR For Startups: The Art of the Press Release in 7 Steps
item.description:
PR For Startups: The Art of the Press Release in 7 Steps

Editor's Note: Today's post comes from Conrad Egusa, CEO of Publicize and a 500 Startups Mentor specializing in PR and media. PR can be INCREDIBLY important for startups -- not only as a one-time bump in growth but also for long-term amplification of your good efforts.

item.title: How to Send Email Like a Startup
item.description:
How to Send Email Like a Startup

A guide to optimizing your transactional emails, marketing emails, and customer relationship as a whole

item.title: The 2016 EyeEm Awards Are Now Open - EyeEm Blog
item.description:
The 2016 EyeEm Awards Are Now Open - EyeEm Blog

Say hello to the 2016 EyeEm Awards. Where 100,000s of photos are entered into five categories, with 100 of them getting exhibited and published. And where one ultimate winner is crowned EyeEm Photographer Of The Year. It's the largest contest for up-and-coming photography talent - and it's all about celebrating you, the EyeEm Community.

item.title: 100 noteworthy young startups - and what they tell us about tech this year
item.description:
100 noteworthy young startups - and what they tell us about tech this year

Looking at what early-stage startups are working on is not only entertaining - and sometimes concerning - it can also be a good indicator of where tech is headed. Since we have data on these young ventures at my company, Startup Tracker, we have the opportunity to glimpse emergent product trends in the startup space.

item.title: [Watch the Unwebinar] 'Increase Your Landing Page Conversions with Video
item.description:
[Watch the Unwebinar] 'Increase Your Landing Page Conversions with Video

Create videos that convert! Kristen Craft and Dave Cole of Wistia explain why video has emerged as one of the top conversion tools for marketers and how you can best leverage video to drive more conversions for your business.

item.title: 6 Landing Page Video Worst Practices to Avoid
item.description:
6 Landing Page Video Worst Practices to Avoid

Get fewer conversions now with garbage landing page videos. We'll show you how! Image by Georgejmclittle via Shutterstock. Psst! Aaron Orendorff will be speaking at our upcoming Call to Action Conference in June. Get your tickets here! Not all landing page videos are created equal. Some are nausea inducing.

item.title: 14 Marketplace Mistakes That Are Killing Your Startup
item.description:
14 Marketplace Mistakes That Are Killing Your Startup

One week ago, I hosted my fifth Marketplace Dinner. This particular one took place at the DogVacay headquarters in Santa Monica. Marketplace Dinners are a series of happy hour-esque meetups that bring together founders and leaders at startup companies growing, you guessed it, marketplaces.

item.title: Startup Foundation | Supporting founders build more successful startups
item.description:
Startup Foundation | Supporting founders build more successful startups

It is obvious that the worlds growing population brings challenges we need to solve. We all want to see the world thrive and humankind progress. We know entrepreneurship is a great way to make change, and work on what one finds important.
